name: Ord (Beta)
description:
Welcome to ORD

Try to escape the caverns as many things come and go, like flip orbs, keys, switches, dry ice, etc.

Use WASD or Arrow keys to Escape every level through entering the portal!

There are 20 levels to complete, each with an optional orb to get (some are hidden in walls, so just be on the lookout (see last screenshot)). 

Press Space on the switch to switch the blocks from blue to red, and red to blue once you see them.

Press Esc or P to pause the game. Press R to Restart.

All Levels and Orbs collected will save. Not Settings though.

Enjoy!
